description: France is a Western European country known for its rich history, culture, and economy. It is a founding member of the European Union and has significant influence in global affairs.
key_facts: Home to the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum
World's most visited country for tourism
Major agricultural producer, especially wine and cheese
Birthplace of human rights and democracy concepts

description: Germany is Europe's largest economy and a global leader in engineering, automotive, and manufacturing industries. It plays a central role in the European Union.
The United States is the world's largest economy and a global superpower. It is known for its technological innovation, diverse culture, and significant influence in international affairs.
key_facts: Home to Silicon Valley and Wall Street

description: Japan is an island nation in East Asia known for its technological advancement, rich cultural heritage, and significant economic influence. It has the world's third-largest economy.
key_facts: World leader in automotive and electronics industries
Unique blend of traditional and modern culture
Major innovator in robotics and technology
Aging population with high life expectancy
